## SenderResource.invite() method

Sends an email invitation to a user. The user will receive an invitation link and a token identifying the account.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
invite(senderId: string): Promise<Sender>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  senderId | string | Unique sender ID |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[Sender](./onespan-sign-node.sender.md)<!-- -->&gt;

The sender associated wth the given ID.
